'''Birthday Wishes for Yoimiya''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==Event Rewards==
Genshin Impact Yoimiya Character Stand (20 Winners)

==Evaluation Methods==
We will randomly select 20 Travelers who successfully participated in the event to receive 1 Character Stand each.

==How to Participate==
Post your birthday wishes for Yoimiya or a screenshot that proves successful sharing of this post in the comments below for a chance to win merchandise prizes!
